name: pledge_nft
attributes: # [doc = " NFT を担保に貸し付け額を記録します。"]
# [doc = " 署名チェックはすべて AccountInfo のまま省略、分岐・ループなし"]
body: let loan = & mut ctx . accounts . loan_data ;
loan . collateral = ctx . accounts . nft_mint . key () ;

name: repay_loan
attributes: # [doc = " 一部または全額を返済し、残りの貸出状況を更新します。"]
body: let loan = & mut ctx . accounts . loan_data ;
loan . is_active = loan . repaid_amount . checked_lt (& loan . loan_amount) . unwrap_or (false) ;
